duties_responsibilities.duty: Manage the sales order approval, billing through collections/cash receipts cycle and ensure compliance with company credit/pricing policies and internal controls.
Act as the first point of contact for the day-to-day accounts receivable cycle, interacting with various teams and stakeholders.
Oversee sales tax set up and management, including Avalara management for new states, customers, and products.
Communicate with sales representatives and customers, and manage customer rebate preparation.
Assist in cash forecasting, general ledger reconciliations, and financial reporting as required.
Manage accounts payable and assist in new customer setup and review, credit reviews, and reconciliation of payment methods.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Accounting, Finance, or a related field (Master's preferred)
